message.body: still awake?
y
doing my nails
watching Bollywood movies
yeah? me too
hot
am getting tired though
am?
I played volleyball for three hours
sounds tiring
You should look at Val's fb status
she copied me!
this is ridiculous
sure is
you seem weirder than normal tonight
maybe the lack of rest
aw, now it's sad
what's the alcohol situation at Josh's?
basically byo?
definitely
He doesn't drink
right
and is apparently a dumbass
oh?
yeah, pretty much
you going to elaborate?
he's basically back with his ex
hahahah whaaaaaaaaaaaaat
what a weirdo
how does that happen haha
he was sooo thrilled with being broken up haha
I have no idea
well, it's not THAT ex he's back together with
ohh
well, that makes more sense then
if you're a dumbass
who the hell rebounds like tha
t
what the christ
people are weird
yup
I more or less told him that too
omg, shoot me...
kristin....
nooo run for it!
do not engage
i repeat, do not engage
I caaaan't run
I wish I had some ice creams right not
nowwwwwwwwww
wow
that is a weird coincidence
characters in the movie just got ice cream
omfg, I still can't believe he's back with Annie
I wanted to smack that girl when we went kayaking
haha
why
not what I would call attractive
that's unrelated. I was referring to her physical appearance being unattractive, not he annoying behavior, though also unattractiver
I knew what you meant
And why would you say you don't think she's my type?
My first impression of her was that she was kind of airheaded
But I obviously didn't talk to her
she's no genius
that's for sure, but she was also trashed
Im just slightly curious what would have happened if, I dunno, I wasn't your ride home...
Do I come across airheaded when I'm drunk?
um, everyone does
aw
she was very cute, but no I wouldn't marry her or anything
she was soooo drunk
and fidgety, she kept playing with the tie thingies on the front of her dress
She was flirting with you
look, I realize it's a douchey thing to say/think, Im just being honest
it's not like you weren't looking to talk to other boys
nah, I just think it's funny
Speaking of dresses: how was mine?
and that's what I meant
I'm not fishing for compliments, I want an objective criticism
I was simply referring to the situation, and it's not like I wanted that to happen, it's just curiosity
I told you it looked nice
last night, remember
Nice is so vague though
the color isn't my favorite
but you wore it well
Color as in white or the lime green?
the green
I'm coming to realize that lime green is one of my favorite colors =/
Goes really well with black ^_^
it kinda does go with black, but what doesn't?
I'd have been fairly pissed
Especially since the last train was at like 11:30 =|
I tink
think
really?
seems so early
Wasn't her name Ally?
yeah
and you would have been livid
Dude, I was drunk
I'm not sure I can *be* pissed when I'm drunk
I'm pretty sure that scenario would have made it possible
HAHA
I could have just called Michael
yeah but who knows how that would have ended up
He probably would have given me a ride home in the morning too
Since he currently works not too far from my apartment
what do you mean how that would have worked out?
yeah, I dunno
I mean I not complaining about how things worked out
oh, and thanks for completely ignoring me about talking to the girl
Here's the thing. If you hadn't kept mentioning her after I told you to go talk to her, I wouldn't have done anything
Also, if you actually want me to stop doing something, you're going to have to tell me in a non-sarcastic way
Because otherwise I'm going to take it as not a big deal
I feel it's pretty obvious when I tell you not to do something
And a "No, I'm serious, please don't go over there" would have stopped me last night
well, it wasn't that big of a deal
You were laughing and _telling_ me, not asking me
and turned out to be fairly entertaining, which was an improvement over what I was doing
See
I figured it would be
right, but that's not the point
I wonder how many times you say that during the day
few, unless it applies
see, part of me wanted to go home with her, just out of spite
but in reality, I'm far to nice to do something like that
that's alright, part of me wanted to go home with Michael last Friday when he offered
and it's just not my style
right, and I would have been pissed
GO AWAY KRISTIN
I think I need to go to bed
well that wasn't my question
a better question is, would you have thought that I would do something like that?
the spite part of the leaving me part?
which we already know the answer to
eh, either
maybe if I'd really pissed you off, then yes to both
btw, you hitting on her like made her night
yeah, I wouldn't have done it out of spite
the thought didn't cross my mind until much later
and that was more just to amuse myself
you would have enjoyed it more because of spite though
eh, more in a ' I told you not to go talk to a girl and this is what you get for it' kind of way
you know how I love irony
I'm not sure that's actually spite
kind of like the whole note thing
It's not
note?
the one she was writing as you were telling me that I should get her number or whatev you said
that was literally the dumbest thing I'd experienced all day
the only thing that surprised me about the whole thing was that she gave it to you and not me
but soooo priceless
wtf _was_ that
hahaha!
Seriously just blows my mind
I remember thinking at some point 'man, this girl is like 23 years old or something...'
and was acting even younger than that
Yeah
but it's whatever, I'll prob never talk to her again
so, that brings us to the question: What do we do in these situations, should they arise in the future?
Stick with the plan?
and thanks, Kristin, for going and bugging Dan...
plan?
The plan was to leave together
riiight
I don't like the idea of trying to scrounge up transportation home last minute
When I'm drunk
a better plan might be to not actively hit on other people when we are out together?
That part doesn't bother me at all
yeah, didn't seem to
Is that a problem?
Do you want me to be jealous? Because that's bad.
ummm, noooo
it's hard to tell what you mean
just making an observation about your behavior last night
kind of seems like an unnecessary thing to actually say unless you have a problem with it
you were a lot more physically demonstrative last Friday than like ever before
Wasn't sure if you were being territorial or not
I guess what I am saying is, we should probably have some sort of ground rules when it comes to social events/outings that could result in a change of the original plans
Or we just have a rule that it doesn't change the original plan?
I don't remember doing anything on friday
right
that would make the most sense
You were like draping your arm around my shoulder and talking close to my ear
I mean, no big deal
eh, I do that shit to all my friends though
It was just kind of interesting, as it seemed like a deviation in behavior
yeah, but _we_ don't do stuff like that, haha
And I'm not saying I _mind_
now we have
alright, haha
I certainly wasn't trying to appear coupled or anything
No, it didn't come across like that to me
do you think it through him off?
If anything, I'd say more like "her evening is taken"
Nah
hmmm
I was upfront about you being my FWB though, basically
certainly didn't seem to stop him
oh?
that's interesting
why?
I never even considered making that statement to women I fancy
I didn't necessarily fancy him
I was having fun flirting with him
But I wasn't really like "omg, I need to see him again"
and somehow the dude that you were at the party with who you sleep with made it into the conversation?
Oh, I was at the party _with_ you, hm? Just thought I was hanging out with you guys and then going back to sleep with you. =P
Are we casually dating or friends with benefits?
we were both at the party
we arrived together
Semantics
we were at the party, together
Alright
I'd say more the latter
Well, yeah. So I _was_ having fun flirting with him and didn't want that to stop
I'd say definitely the latter =P
whatev
just saying that to others, they may not see it that way
hence why I don't bring it up
and I also feel that it's more appealing to a guy if a girl discloses that she has a fwb or whatever, that vice-versa
So when you came over when he stepped away and draped yourself on me, and then he came back and was like "so...what's going on here", I told the truth
Probably
No, not probably, definitely
Because women are supposed to want monogamy and men are supposed to like sex
And therefore would like women who like sex
correct, as silly as it is
I wasn't particularly attached to him, so I didn't care if it actually scared him off
look, I don't really care what you tell....wait, I do care
And if it didn't scare him off, he knew that there was no previous relationship that he had to yield to
yeah, I just generally feel it's more of a 'need to know' basis
HAHAHA!
yeah, guys are SOOO worried about that
/shrug
Some are
eh, not really
Just like some girls are/aren't
right, I just think most people assume, that if I
if I am flirting with you, that I am for all intents and purposes, single
I rarely see it come up in conversation
Well, oversharing information seems to be a thing of mine, no matter how much I try to curtail it
I tend to do the same, which is why I try to be conscious of it
and actually, girlie did ask about you last night
I just told her that you were a 'friend'
which is telling the truth. She didn't ask if I was sleeping with you
lol
so speaking of the greek god, are you seeing him tomorrow?
Haven't solidified anything
The greek festival isn't far from Josh's, though, so probably
/shrug
seems a little out of the way for him though
no, he's working/volunteer in the festival
+ing
So he's already going to be in Wilmington
Which is on the way to Josh's
So I was thinking about stopping at the festival
My planning tendencies are proving to be a little too aggressive for new people, so I've been trying to not push it =/
sigh
seems reasonable enough
I think I'm going to print up new business/networking cards
yeah, I need to do that
with my contact information on one side, and a guide to interacting with me on the other =|
and stop relying on serendipity, and drunk girls handwriting
I want to see that paper
You know, you have a phone
If you'd ASKED for her number, you could have put it in said phone directly
uh huh
that would have been boring though
True
Then we wouldn't have this awesome story
like I said, had there not been a note I would have gotten it from here when we left
ugh, she was sooo dumb
XD
but sooo adorable
Am I spending Saturday and Sunday night there?
What? We semi discussed this
ummm, I dunno
I just want to know what I need to pack tomorrow
we did?
Yes
hmmm
after sex?
Since I'd have to pack work clothes for Monday
not in the last couple of days
earlier this week
because that doesn't count
haha
no, I don't think it was after sex
I don't really care either way
well I still don't remember
You don't seem particularly thrilled with the idea, haha, which is fine
Val's grandpa is apparently dying
so I
oh =/
she still doing the brunch thing on Sunday?
I'm not sure if we are still having the brunch thing at her house, but if not we will just do it here
what's the implications
Do you not want me staying Saturday? =P
saturday I do believe we already discussed and agreed to
geez, this sounds like a business meeting
Plans can change
We didn't sign a contract =P
verbal agreement
still binding
we didn't shake hands on it
Or pinkie swear
haha, would you just prefer me not to come down this weekend?
Would clear up your concerns about Claire
Hmm, might be 2101
uh what?
hadn't thought of that before
oh, just glanced at the note
ah
no, I mean I don't want it to be like that
and you are certainly welcome to stay
in fact, ugh..
so I was talking to claire earlier after we left the bar, she gave me a ride home
and she was saying something about
"do people crash at Josh's after the party?"
she'll be at the party then?
yeah, very likely
but we knew that
I didn't, I'm not really in your loop, haha
fb
there's no Annie RSVPed yes?
not sure if she was phishing for whether or not people will crash here, as I has mentioned carpooling
You did say Annie, right?
Amy?
oh, annie. Sorry, thought you meant claire, I was like wtf
oh, no
lol
Sorry
Too many "she"s
I'm sure she will be, her and josh have been inseparable the last few days
ugh >.<
lol
I was hoping my bff would be single for a little
ah well
so...
yeah, I don't really like the idea of claire crashing here
sat night
and to be honest, I kinda losing interest =|
k
That's a weird situation.
kinda impossible?
right
lol
then there's Christine
I'm more or less at maximum capacity for women that I feel comfortable talking to at the same time
Who's Christine again?
some chick, who decided to write me back like 5 days later
ah
yeah, kind of flighty
whatevs
she was probably busy
but otherwise seems cool, she'll be at a concert on sat night so
right, busy for 5 days continuously
because txting is so hard
Yeah, I ended up dropping an interesting converation on OkC because this past week has been crazy
Oh, you'd reached texting?
Was that the opera chick?
it wasn't awesome guy was it?
nope
thank god
I would have kept up on that
alright, I need to get to bed
I'll just plan for Saturday night
Which really fits better with my responsibilities anyway
shit, is it really 2am?
Yes
you talk a lot
I can't believe we are still awake
it takes time
yeah, I guess
lol
I was just saying that to be obnoxious
ok, so yeah
catch me tomorrow with any questions
night
kk
sleep well
